promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong boar steel-type pokemon wearing metallic gemstones. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gigasteelusk, a a massive strong boar steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Time Rewind, Destructor Beam. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "steel" or "Gigasteelusk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, boar-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal metal-swine dwells in mountains, using Time Rewind to prevent landslides and Destructor Beam to excavate habitat. Highly territorial.
